name: Heart Risk Assessment
desc: The project aims to predict the risk of heart disease using machine learning techniques.

name: URL Shortener
desc: A simple URL Shortener application written in Python, it allows users to shorten url using 2 methods.

name: GameVorteX - FreeFire eSports

desc: Personal Portfolio Website. Don't Need Much Info About It, Just Scroll Down. You're Here Only!

name: Alarm Clock
desc: This project is a simple graphical user interface (GUI) based Alarm Clock application built using Python's tkinter library

name: IPL Analysis
desc: This project analyzes the data from the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2022 season. The dataset includes match details such as teams, venues, scores, winners, and notable player performances.

name: Visage_verify
desc: This is a Flask web application for face recognition-based attendance tracking. The application allows users to register their faces, take attendance using a webcam, and view attendance records.

name: Stock Predictor
desc: Having real-time insights into your favorite stocks like AAPL, GOOGL, TSLA, and more at your fingertips.

name: Movie Genre Detection
desc: This project aims to predict the genres of movies based on their synopses using machine learning techniques. The dataset used contains movie synopses and their corresponding genres.
